name: The Snow Bunker
description:
The Snow Bunker is a very small demonstration environment (not a game) produced with RPG Maker VX Ace  designed to test the feasibility of a game made in an RPGMaker engine with an isometric perspective. Because a true isometric mode is not available in any of the RM engines, I’ve used diagonal movement with parallax backdrops to try and achieve something similar.

The habitat consists of a small cosy underground bunker with various rooms and some appliances (toaster, fridge etc) which can be interacted with. Perhaps a nice place to live during winter or shelter from a catastrophe.

INSTRUCTIONS: Game.exe to begin. Cursor Keys to move, ENTER key to use. ESCAPE to quit.
